meta.description: Optimize the production of medication patches and anti-biotic creams to maximize the number of people treated.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by the hospital

params.name: time_per_batch
params.description: Time required to prepare each batch of product

params.name: materials_per_batch
params.description: Materials required for each batch of product

params.name: treatment_capacity
params.description: Number of people treated by each batch of product

params.name: total_time_available
params.description: Total available staff time in minutes

params.name: max_total_batches
params.description: Maximum total number of batches that can be produced

vars.name: batches
vars.description: Number of batches produced for each product

objective.name: max_people_treated
objective.description: Maximize the number of people treated

constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: Total preparation time must not exceed available time

constraints.name: materials_constraint
constraints.description: Total materials used must not exceed available materials

constraints.name: total_batches_constraint
constraints.description: Total number of batches must not exceed maximum allowed

constraints.name: cream_patch_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: There must be at least twice as many anti-biotic creams as medication patches
